name: XP gain
description: +2% XP gain

name: XP gain
description: +7% XP gain

name: Secret XP
description: Gain 30 XP upon first entering a secret or
super secret room.

name: Unholy Growth
description: +20% XP gain
Starting stats are 5% lower for all characters.

name: Challenge XP
description: Gain 30 XP upon completing a challenge room round.

name: Boss Challenge XP
description: Apply challenge room XP bonuses to boss challenge rooms.

name: Isaac's Blessing
description: Start a run with +5% all stats.
Restarting the run removes this effect.
Defeating Mom's Heart re-enables this for the next run.

name: Respec Chance
description: +10% chance to gain a respec point
when completing a floor.

name: Respec Chance
description: +30% chance to gain a respec point
when completing a floor.

name: Relearning
description: Can no longer gain respec points from completing floors.
Gain 10 respec points when winning a run, and
additionally gain 2 respec points per completed floor in that run.

name: Quick Wit
description: +15% XP earned for the first 8 seconds upon entering a room.
Afterwards, this bonus gradually lowers down to -20% over 10 seconds.
Does not apply in boss rooms.

name: Boss XP
description: +4% XP from slain bosses.

name: Boss XP
description: +10% XP from slain bosses.

name: Beast Challenger
description: +25% XP from slain bosses.
-15% XP from slain normal monsters.

name: Monster XP
description: +4% XP from slain normal monsters.

name: Monster XP
description: +10% XP from slain normal monsters.

name: Swarm Challenger
description: +25% XP from slain normal monsters.
-15% XP from slain bosses.

name: Secret XP
description: Gain 100 XP upon first entering a secret or
super secret room.

name: Expert Spelunker
description: Gain no XP when first entering a secret room.
Gain 350 XP when first entering a super secret room.

name: Luck
description: +0.01 luck

name: Range
description: +0.02 range

name: Shot Speed
description: +0.01 shot speed

name: Devil/Angel Rooms
description: +0.25% chance for the devil/angel room to show up

name: Speed
description: +0.01 speed

name: Damage
description: +0.01 damage

name: Luck
description: +0.1 luck

name: Range
description: +0.1 range

name: Shot Speed
description: +0.05 shot speed

name: Devil/Angel Rooms
description: +1% chance for the devil/angel room to show up

name: Speed
description: +0.04 speed

name: Damage
description: +0.05 damage

name: Tears
description: +0.01 tears

name: Tears
description: +0.05 tears

name: Mapping Chance
description: +1% chance for the map to be revealed upon entering a floor
Works from the second floor onwards

name: Mapping Chance
description: +4% chance for the map to be revealed upon entering a floor
Works from the second floor onwards

name: Coin Dupe Chance
description: +0.5% chance for coin pickups to grant an additional coin

name: Coin Dupe Chance
description: +1% chance for coin pickups to grant an additional coin

name: Key Dupe Chance
description: +0.25% chance for key pickups to grant an additional key

name: Key Dupe Chance
description: +1% chance for key pickups to grant an additional key

name: Bomb Dupe Chance
description: +0.25% chance for bomb pickups to grant an additional bomb

name: Bomb Dupe Chance
description: +1% chance for bomb pickups to grant an additional bomb

name: Good Deeds
description: Helping any type of beggar grants +0.02 luck

name: Grab Bags
description: +0.25% chance to spawn a grab-bag when collecting a pickup

name: Cosmic Realignment
description: Allocate to choose a character. Once chosen, you may unlock
items as if playing as that character while using a different one.
If a locked tainted character is picked, you may unlock them the usual way while
using a different character.
Beware the cosmic curse each character brings...

name: Luck Down
description: -0.03 luck

name: Hell's Favour
description: +1 to a random stat when entering a devil room.
-1 to a random stat when entering an angel room.
Entering an angel room will trigger a curse on the next floor.

name: Heaven's Favour
description: +1 to a random stat when entering an angel room.
-1 to a random stat when entering a devil room.
Entering a devil room will trigger a curse on the next floor.

name: Magic Die
description: Using the D6 grants a permanent stat boost. Boosted stats depend on the room you used the D6 in:
- Angel room: +7% speed and tears
- Devil room: +6% damage and range
- Treasure room and shop: +7% shot speed and luck
- Boss room: if you have a boost, augment it by +3%, otherwise +3% all stats
- Anywhere else: +2% all stats

name: Intermittent Conceptions
description: Begin the game with Birthright.
When first obtaining an item, remove birthright.
When next obtaining an item, receive birthright again.
Effect cycles.

name: All Stats - Birthright
description: +0.01 all stats while holding Birthright

name: Brother Items All Stats
description: +0.05% all stats per item obtained by the opposing brother, up to 15%.

name: D6 Pickups
description: 2% chance when using D6 to spawn a random pickup (coin, bomb, key or heart).

name: D6 Charge
description: 2% chance when using D6 to keep half of its charge.

name: D6 Pickups
description: 8% chance when using D6 to spawn a random pickup (coin, bomb, key or heart).

name: D6 Charge
description: 8% chance when using D6 to keep half of its charge.

name: Brother Items All Stats
description: +0.2% all stats per item obtained by the opposing brother, up to 15%.

name: Magdalene's Blessing
description: +0.1 speed
-0.1 damage
-0.02 speed and +0.1 damage for every red heart container after the 4th one.

name: Crystal Heart
description: Yum heart heals an additional 1/2 heart.
4% chance for Yum Heart to turn a red heart into a bone heart.

name: Blood Donor
description: Blood donation machines grant 1 charge to your active item.
If using Yum Heart, 50% chance to gain 2 charges instead.

name: Yum Heart Healing
description: 0.5% chance for Yum Heart to heal an additional 1/2 heart.

name: Blood Donation Machine Spawn
description: 1% chance to spawn a Blood Donation Machine at the start of a floor.
Doesn't apply to first floor.

name: Yum Heart Healing
description: 3% chance for Yum Heart to heal an additional 1/2 heart.

name: Blood Donation Machine Spawn
description: 5% chance to spawn a Blood Donation Machine at the start of a floor.
Doesn't apply to first floor.

name: Blood Donation Luck
description: +0.01 luck when using a Blood Donation Machine.

name: Blood Donation Luck
description: +0.05 luck when using a Blood Donation Machine.

name: Blood Donation Nickel
description: 0.4% chance to spawn an additional Nickel when using a Blood Donation Machine.

name: Blood Donation Nickel
description: 2% chance to spawn an additional Nickel when using a Blood Donation Machine.

name: Room Clear Heal
description: 0.1% chance to heal 1/2 red heart when clearing a room.
Double the chance and healing on boss rooms.

name: Impromptu Gambler
description: Spawn a crane game in treasure rooms. These can grant any unlocked item, but cost 8 coins to use.
Interacting with the crane game removes the room's regular item.
Grabbing the regular item removes the crane game.

name: Thievery
description: +30% chance to steal items from the shop instead of purchasing.
If you steal an item, Greed will have a chance to show up
after the floor's boss is defeated.
Each stolen item increases Greed's chance to show up based on its price (price * 3)%.

name: Fickle Fortune
description: +7% luck while holding a trinket.
Minimum luck is 1 while holding a trinket.
7% chance when hit for your trinket to be dropped.
7% chance for dropped trinkets to vanish.

name: Stealing Chance
description: +2% chance to steal items from the shop instead of purchasing.

name: Random Trinket Spawn
description: 1% chance to spawn a random trinket at the beginning of a floor.
Doesn't apply in first floor.

name: Random Trinket Spawn
description: 5% chance to spawn a random trinket at the beginning of a floor.
Doesn't apply in first floor.

name: Free Machine Use
description: 1% chance for machines that use coins to cost nothing on use.

name: Free Machine Use
description: 4% chance for machines that use coins to cost nothing on use.

name: Arcade Reveal
description: 8% chance to reveal the arcade room's location if it's present on a floor.

name: Arcade Reveal
description: 20% chance to reveal the arcade room's location if it's present on a floor.

name: Shop Reveal
description: 8% chance to reveal the shop room's location if it's present on a floor.

name: Shop Reveal
description: 20% chance to reveal the shop room's location if it's present on a floor.

name: Room Clear Nickel
description: 0.2% chance to spawn an additional nickel when clearing a room.
Double the chance on boss rooms.

name: Dark Heart
description: Start with an additional black heart.
-6% damage and speed while you have no black hearts.
Book of belial removes this reduction for the current room.

name: Inner Demon
description: Start with Judas' Shadow.
Dark Judas starts with 1 black heart instead.
-15% damage as Dark Judas.

name: Sacrifice Darkness
description: When collecting a black heart, trigger it and receive a soul heart instead.
+1% all stats per sacrificed black heart, up to 6%. Resets every floor.
35% chance to convert dropped soul hearts to black hearts.

name: Dark Judas Speed
description: +0.5% speed as Dark Judas

name: Dark Judas Shot Speed and Range
description: +0.5% shot speed and range as Dark Judas

name: Book of Belial Charge
description: 0.1% chance for the Book of Belial to gain a charge when hitting a boss.
Generates a maximum of 12 charges per room.

name: Book of Belial Charge
description: 1% chance for the Book of Belial to gain a charge when hitting a boss.
Generates a maximum of 12 charges per room.

name: Lost Black Hearts Luck
description: +0.01 luck whenever you lose black hearts

name: Lost Black Hearts Luck
description: +0.1 luck whenever you lose black hearts

name: Blue Gambit
description: The first card you find is guaranteed to be V - The Hierophant.
The first pill you find is guaranteed to be Balls of Steel.
20% chance to take 1/2 heart damage when using a card or pill that isn't either of the above.

name: Brown Blessing
description: Start with Petrified Poop.
Using The Poop has a 7% chance to spawn a poop item. Doesn't apply in the first floor.

name: Slipping Essence
description: Losing a soul heart has a 40% chance to spawn a full soul heart.
When this happens, halve this chance and receive -0.1 luck.

name: Soul Heart on Pill/Card
description: 0.3% chance to receive half a soul heart when using a pill or card.

name: Soul Heart on Pill/Card
description: 1% chance to receive half a soul heart when using a pill or card.

name: Poop Item Luck
description: +0.03 luck per held poop item

name: Poop Item Luck
description: +0.1 luck per held poop item

name: Poop Trinket Luck
description: +0.03 luck while holding a poop trinket

name: Poop Trinket Luck
description: +0.1 luck while holding a poop trinket

name: The Poop All Stats
description: +0.01 all stats after using The Poop (once per room).
Resets every room.

name: The Poop All Stats
description: +2% all stats after using The Poop (once per room).
Resets every room.

name: Soul Heart Tears And Range
description: +0.25% tears and range whenever you gain soul hearts, up to 10%.
Resets every floor.

name: Heartless
description: Every room you clear grants +0.5% all stats, up to 10%.
Picking up any heart halves your current bonus.

name: Dark Protection
description: When first reaching 1 heart or less, gain a black heart.
Resets when defeating Mom's Heart.

name: Carrion Avian
description: +0.15 damage when dead bird kills an enemy, up to +3. Resets every floor.
If dead bird kills a boss, gain a permanent +0.6 damage instead.

name: Dead Bird Shield
description: 2% chance for the hit that wakes dead bird to be nullified.

name: Dead Bird Shield
description: 10% chance for the hit that wakes dead bird to be nullified.

name: Active Dead Bird Damage
description: +0.02 damage while dead bird is active

name: Active Dead Bird Speed
description: +0.02 speed while dead bird is active

name: Active Dead Bird Tears
description: +0.02 tears while dead bird is active

name: Active Dead Bird Range
description: +0.02 range while dead bird is active

name: Active Dead Bird Shot Speed
description: +0.02 shot speed while dead bird is active

name: Dead Bird Damage
description: Dead bird deals an additional 1% of your damage per tick.

name: Luck On Room Clear Below Full
description: +0.01 luck when clearing a room below full red hearts.

name: Luck On Room Clear Below Full
description: +0.05 luck when clearing a room below full red hearts.

name: Hasted
description: +10% tears and shot speed
Taking damage reduces this bonus by 1.5%, up to 5 times.
Resets every floor.

name: Rage Buildup
description: +0.02 damage when hitting an enemy, up to +3.
Getting hit resets the bonus.

name: Hearty
description: Start with an additional red heart.
-3% damage per remaining red heart.

name: Temporary Damage
description: +0.5% damage for 2.5 seconds after killing an enemy, or after hitting a boss 8 times.
Doesn't stack.

name: Temporary Speed
description: +0.5% speed for 2.5 seconds after killing an enemy, or after hitting a boss 8 times.
Doesn't stack.

name: Speed When Hit
description: +0.5% speed when hit, up to 15%. Resets every room.

name: Boss Culling
description: 1% chance on hit to deal 10x damage to bosses below 10% HP.

name: Boss Quick Kill Luck
description: +0.05 luck if you clear the boss room within 1 minute of entering it.

name: Boss Flawless Luck
description: +0.05 luck if you clear the boss room without getting hit more than 3 times.

name: Boss Culling
description: 5% chance on hit to deal 10x damage to bosses below 10% HP.

name: Boss Quick Kill Luck
description: +0.25 luck if you clear the boss room within 1 minute of entering it.

name: Boss Flawless Luck
description: +0.25 luck if you clear the boss room without getting hit more than 3 times.

name: Temporary Damage
description: +3% damage for 2.5 seconds after killing an enemy, or after hitting a boss 8 times.
Doesn't stack.

name: Temporary Speed
description: +3% speed for 2.5 seconds after killing an enemy, or after hitting a boss 8 times.
Doesn't stack.

name: Bloodcharge
description: +6 range
-30% tears

name: Demonic Souvenirs
description: Spawn III - The Empress at the beginning of every other floor, starting from the first.
Spawn a random evil trinket at the beginning of the second floor you enter.
+6% damage and tears while holding an evil trinket.

name: Demon Helpers
description: 33% chance to receive half a black heart back when helping a Devil Beggar.
Once a Devil Beggar gives a reward, 33% chance to additionally spawn a demon familiar.
5% chance to spawn a devil beggar at the beginning of a floor, starting from second floor.
This chance doubles every floor up to 40%, and resets when one spawns.

name: Black Heart Conversion
description: 0.5% chance to replace dropped hearts of any type with black hearts.

name: Black Heart On Deals
description: 1% chance to gain an additional black heart when spending hearts for items, such as devil deals.

name: Evil Trinket Luck
description: +0.05 luck while holding an evil trinket.

name: Free Devil Beggar Help
description: 0.5% chance for devil beggars to return half a black heart when helped.

name: Card Use Damage
description: +0.02 damage when using a card, up to +3. Resets every floor.

name: Card Use Tears
description: +0.02 tears when using a card, up to +3. Resets every floor.

name: Black Heart Conversion
description: 2% chance to replace dropped hearts of any type with black hearts.

name: Black Heart On Deals
description: 5% chance to gain an additional black heart when spending hearts for items, such as devil deals.

name: Evil Trinket Luck
description: +0.25 luck while holding an evil trinket.

name: Free Devil Beggar Help
description: 3% chance for devil beggars to return half a black heart when helped.

name: Soulful Awakening
description: Spawn a soul heart on death.
+2 luck
-0.5 luck on death

name: King's Curse
description: Start with Damocles activated.
-5% all stats while not Lazarus Risen.

name: A True Ending?
description: First floor's boss, Mom and Mom's Heart drop a Suicide King card when defeated.
+2% all stats as Lazarus Risen per Suicide King card used.

name: Lazarus Damage
description: +0.02 damage. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Speed
description: +0.01 speed. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Tears
description: +0.02 tears. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Range
description: +0.02 range. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Luck
description: +0.02 luck. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lucky All Stats
description: +0.01 all stats while luck is positive.

name: Plan C
description: 1% chance for Mom to drop Plan C when defeated.

name: Lazarus Hearts On Room Clear
description: 0.3% chance to drop an additional 1/2 red heart on room clear as Lazarus.
0.3% chance to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart on room clear as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Damage
description: +0.08 damage. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Speed
description: +0.05 speed. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Tears
description: +0.08 tears. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Range
description: +0.08 range. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Luck
description: +0.08 luck. Halve this bonus as Lazarus Risen.

name: Lazarus Hearts On Room Clear
description: 1% chance to drop an additional 1/2 red heart on room clear as Lazarus.
1% chance to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart on room clear as Lazarus Risen.

name: Plan C
description: 5% chance for Mom to drop Plan C when defeated.

name: Chaotic Treasury
description: First floor's treasure room contains an additional Chaos item pedestal.
While you have Chaos, treasure rooms spawn an additional item.
Grabbing an item in a treasure room removes all other items in the room.

name: Sporadic Growth
description: When starting a run, apply +1% to a random stat 6 times.
When entering a floor past the first, apply +1% to a random stat 2 times.

name: Starblessed
description: Start with an additional random item from the treasure room pool.
First floor's boss drops an additional XVII - The Stars card.

name: Treasure/Shop Item Stat
description: +0.01 to a random stat when first obtaining a treasure room or shop item.

name: Devil/Angel/Boss Item Stat
description: +0.02 to a random stat when first obtaining a devil, angel or boss room item.

name: Passive Item Luck
description: -0.02 to +0.02 luck when first obtaining any passive item.

name: Additional Coin/Key/Bomb
description: 10% chance to start with an additional coin, key or bomb.

name: Eden's Blessing Spawn
description: 1% chance for Eden's Blessing to spawn at the beginning of a floor, starting from the second floor.
Can only happen once per run.

name: Additional Coin/Key/Bomb
description: 60% chance to start with an additional coin, key or bomb.

name: Eden's Blessing Spawn
description: 4% chance for Eden's Blessing to spawn at the beginning of a floor, starting from the second floor.
Can only happen once per run.

name: Treasure/Shop Item Stat
description: +1% to a random stat when first obtaining a treasure room or shop item.

name: Devil/Angel/Boss Item Stat
description: +1% to a random stat when first obtaining a devil, angel or boss room item.

name: Passive Item Luck
description: -1% to +1% luck when first obtaining any passive item.

name: Trinket Luck
description: -0.01 to +0.01 luck when first obtaining any trinket.

name: Spectral Advantage
description: +2% damage and +0.15 luck for each heart you would've gained from items you pick up,
up to a total 40% damage, +3 luck.
If you obtain birthright, gain +8% tears.

name: Sacred Aegis
description: Unlock Holy Mantle with The Lost when allocating this node.
Holy mantle regenerates after 7 seconds, once per room.
-7% all stats each time you lose holy mantle, up to 2 times. Resets every room.

name: Heartseeker Phantasm
description: Dropped red and eternal hearts are converted to soul hearts.
Collecting a soul or black heart grants +0.2 luck.
+1% all stats for every 3 hearts collected.

name: Killing Hit Negation
description: 1% chance to negate an incoming hit if it would've killed you.

name: Inactive Holy Mantle All Stats
description: +0.01 all stats while holy mantle is inactive.

name: Soul Hearts Tears
description: Soul hearts grant +0.01 tears when collected, up to a total +1.

name: Black Hearts Damage
description: Black hearts grant +0.01 damage when collected, up to a total +3.

name: Eternal D6 Charge
description: 2% chance for the Eternal D6 to not consume charges on use.

name: Killing Hit Negation
description: 4% chance to negate an incoming hit if it would've killed you.

name: Inactive Holy Mantle All Stats
description: +0.05 all stats while holy mantle is inactive.

name: Soul Hearts Tears
description: Soul hearts grant +0.03 tears when collected, up to a total +1.

name: Black Hearts Damage
description: Black hearts grant +0.04 damage when collected, up to a total +3.

name: Eternal D6 Charge
description: 8% chance for the Eternal D6 to not consume charges on use.

name: Soul Heart On Room Clear
description: 1% chance to drop an additional soul heart when clearing a room.

name: Soul Heart On Room Clear
description: 5% chance to drop an additional soul heart when clearing a room.

name: Minion Maneuvering
description: +3% speed per active familiar, up to 15%.
Using the box of friends doubles the maximum bonus for the current room.

name: Heavy Friends
description: Start with BFFS!
-25% speed

name: Daemon Army
description: Start with an additional Incubus.
Mom drops an additional Incubus on defeat.
Baby familiar items other than Incubus no longer show up.

name: Familiar Kill Soul Heart
description: 0.2% chance for enemies killed by familiars to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart.

name: Active Familiars Luck
description: +0.01 luck per currently active familiar.

name: Incubus Damage
description: +0.25% damage per active incubus.

name: Incubus Tears
description: +0.25% tears per active incubus.

name: Box Of Friends Charge
description: 1% chance for box of friends to keep 1 charge on use.

name: Box Of Friends All Stats
description: +0.01 all stats after using box of friends. Resets every room.

name: Familiar Kill Soul Heart
description: 1% chance for enemies killed by familiars to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart.

name: Active Familiars Luck
description: +0.05 luck per currently active familiar.

name: Incubus Damage
description: +1% damage per active incubus.

name: Incubus Tears
description: +1% tears per active incubus.

name: Box Of Friends Charge
description: 5% chance for box of friends to keep 1 charge on use.

name: Box Of Friends All Stats
description: +0.05 all stats after using box of friends. Resets every room.

name: Keeper's Blessing
description: Healing from a coin grants you an additional 2 coins, up to 4 times per room.
20% chance for Wooden Nickel to spawn an additional penny when used.

name: Gulp!
description: Spawn a Swallowed Penny at the start of every other floor, starting from the first.
+1.5 luck while holding Swallowed Penny.
30% chance to lose the Swallowed Penny when hit, if held.
Gain 1-4 coins when losing the Swallowed Penny this way.

name: Avid Shopper
description: Start with Steam Sale.
Start with an additional 5 coins.
Lose 1-3 coins when hit.

name: Coin Shield
description: 2% chance to negate a hit that would've killed you, if you have more than 0 coins.
Negating a hit removes all your coins and fully discharges your active item.

name: Item Purchase Luck
description: +0.01 luck when you purchase an item.

name: Keep Coins On Purchase
description: 1% chance to keep 1-3 coins when purchasing an item.

name: Greed Boss
description: 5% chance for Greed to spawn after defeating the first floor's boss.

name: Greed Lower Health
description: Greed has 1% lower health.

name: Greed Additional Coin Drops
description: 3% chance for Greed to drop an additional nickel.
1% chance for Greed to drop an additional dime.

name: Blue Fly Death Damage
description: +0.01 damage whenever a blue fly dies, up to +1.2. Resets every floor.

name: Coin Shield
description: 10% chance to negate a hit that would've killed you, if you have more than 0 coins.
Negating a hit removes all your coins and fully discharges your active item.

name: Item Purchase Luck
description: +0.04 luck when you purchase an item.

name: Keep Coins On Purchase
description: 5% chance to keep 1-3 coins when purchasing an item.

name: Greed Boss
description: 15% chance for Greed to spawn after defeating the first floor's boss.

name: Greed Lower Health
description: Greed has 4% lower health.

name: Greed Additional Coin Drops
description: 9% chance for Greed to drop an additional nickel.
3% chance for Greed to drop an additional dime.

name: Blue Fly Death Damage
description: +0.04 damage whenever a blue fly dies, up to +1.2. Resets every floor.

name: Apollyon's Blessing
description: 40% chance to keep half of the charge when using Void.
Cannot be cursed with Curse of the Blind.

name: Null
description: When entering a floor, if Void hasn't absorbed any active items, gain +5% all stats, up to 15%.
If Void has absorbed active items, 50% chance to gain an extra charge when clearing a room.
-10% all stats while not holding Void.

name: Harbinger Locusts
description: Spawn a random locust trinket in the second floor you enter.
Spawn a random locust trinket after defeating Mom.
2% chance to replace any non-locust trinket drop with a random locust trinket. Defeating a boss
increases this chance by 1%, up to 10%.
Using void consumes all locust trinkets dropped in the room, applying their
effects to you passively.

name: Void Blue Flies
description: 1% chance for Void to spawn 4 blue flies on use.

name: Void Blue Spiders
description: 1% chance for Void to spawn 3 blue spiders on use.

name: Void Annihilation
description: 4% chance for Void to instantly kill a random non-boss enemy in the room on use.

name: First Floor Eraser
description: 1% chance for the second floor's treasure room to additionally contain an Eraser
item pedestal.

name: Locusts Luck
description: +0.02 luck while holding a locust. Consuming a locust grants a permanent +0.01 luck instead.

name: Locust of Conquest Boon
description: +0.5% speed per Locust of Conquest held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Death Boon
description: +0.5% tears per Locust of Death held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Famine Boon
description: +0.5% range and shot speed per Locust of Famine held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Pestilence Boon
description: +0.5% luck per Locust of Pestilence held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of War Boon
description: +0.5% damage per Locust of War held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Void Blue Flies
description: 5% chance for Void to spawn 4 blue flies on use.

name: Void Blue Spiders
description: 5% chance for Void to spawn 3 blue spiders on use.

name: Void Annihilation
description: 20% chance for Void to instantly kill a random non-boss enemy in the room on use.

name: First Floor Eraser
description: 5% chance for the second floor's treasure room to additionally contain an Eraser
item pedestal.

name: Locust of Conquest Boon
description: +2% speed per Locust of Conquest held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Death Boon
description: +2% tears per Locust of Death held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Famine Boon
description: +2% range and shot speed per Locust of Famine held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of Pestilence Boon
description: +2% luck per Locust of Pestilence held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Locust of War Boon
description: +2% damage per Locust of War held/consumed, up to 15%.

name: Soulful
description: Losing a bone heart spawns a soul heart.
-0.25 luck when you lose a bone heart.

name: Spirit Ebb and Flow
description: Landing 6 hits as The Soul grants The Forgotten a 10% damage and tears boost.
Landing 6 hits as The Forgotten grants The Soul a 10% damage and speed boost.
Boosts are reset every room.
oldType: [The Forgotten's Tree] Spirit Ebb and Flow

name: Inner Flare
description: The Soul deals 15% more damage against slowed enemies.
Switching to The Soul slows enemies in the room for 2 seconds. Can only happen once per room.

name: Forgotten Melee Tear Buff
description: Hitting enemies with The Forgotten's melee attack increases damage dealt by your tears by 0.2%,
up to 20%.
Effect resets every room.

name: Forgotten Soul Damage
description: +0.01 damage with The Forgotten per remaining soul/black heart.

name: Forgotten Soul Tears
description: +0.01 tears with The Forgotten per remaining soul/black heart.

name: Soul Bone Damage
description: +0.01 damage with The Soul per remaining bone heart.

name: Soul Bone Tears
description: +0.01 tears with The Soul per remaining bone heart.

name: Inner Flare Slow Duration
description: +0.1 seconds to Inner Flare slow duration.

name: Forgotten Melee Tear Buff
description: Hitting enemies with The Forgotten's melee attack increases damage dealt by your tears by 1%,
up to 20%.
Effect resets every room.

name: Forgotten Soul Damage
description: +0.05 damage with The Forgotten per remaining soul/black heart.

name: Forgotten Soul Tears
description: +0.05 tears with The Forgotten per remaining soul/black heart.

name: Soul Bone Damage
description: +0.05 damage with The Soul per remaining bone heart.

name: Soul Bone Tears
description: +0.05 tears with The Soul per remaining bone heart.

name: Inner Flare Slow Duration
description: +0.5 seconds to Inner Flare slow duration.

name: Will-o-the-Wisp
description: Your wisps take 60% reduced damage.
+0.5 damage for the current room when a wisp is destroyed, up to +2.5.

name: Soul Trickle
description: Collecting a soul or black heart heals 1/2 red heart.
While you are full health, 30% chance to convert red heart drops into soul hearts.
Wisps have a 5% chance to drop half a soul heart when damaged. This effect
can happen twice per room.

name: Fate Pendulum
description: Start with Metronome.
Clearing a room has a 30% chance to grant an additional active item charge.
Clearing a room has a 10% chance to grant an additional soul charge.
-50% all stats while not holding Metronome.

name: Active Item Wisp
description: 0.5% chance to generate an additional regular wisp when using an active item with 2 or more charges.

name: Room Clear Soul Charge
description: 0.5% chance to gain a Soul Charge on room clear.

name: Wisp Destroyed Luck
description: +0.01 luck when a wisp is destroyed, up to +4.

name: Wisps Orbital Boon
description: When entering a floor, +0.02% all stats per wisp orbiting you, up to a total 15%.

name: Red Hearts Soul Charge
description: 1% chance to gain a Soul Charge when picking up a red heart.

name: Active Item Wisp
description: 2% chance to generate an additional regular wisp when using an active item with 2 or more charges.

name: Room Clear Soul Charge
description: 2% chance to gain a Soul Charge on room clear.

name: Wisp Destroyed Luck
description: +0.05 luck when a wisp is destroyed, up to +4.

name: Wisps Orbital Boon
description: When entering a floor, +0.1% all stats per wisp orbiting you, up to a total 15%.

name: Red Hearts Soul Charge
description: 4% chance to gain a Soul Charge when picking up a red heart.

name: Heart Link
description: Red heart ups are applied to both brothers.
-1% damage, tears and range per 1/2 red heart difference for the brother with
the lower remaining red hearts.

name: Statue Pilgrimage
description: Esau starts with Gnawed Leaf.
Esau doesn't shoot while transformed.
Enemies target Jacob instead while Esau is transformed.
Jacob gains +7% all stats while close to transformed Esau.

name: Coordination
description: Landing 5 hits as Jacob grants Esau +10% tears.
Landing 5 hits as Esau grants Jacob +10% damage.
Effect resets every room.

name: Brother Hit Negation
description: 1% chance to negate a killing hit if the opposing brother has more than 1 red heart remaining.
When this happens, set the opposing brother's remaining red hearts to 1.

name: Heart Luck
description: +0.01 luck per 1/2 heart of any type with the brother that has the lower remaining hearts.
Bonus is given to both brothers.

name: Birthright
description: 0.5% chance for Mom to additionally drop Birthright when defeated.
If Mom doesn't drop Birthright, roll for half the chance again when defeating Mom's heart.

name: Jacob Heart On Kill
description: 0.5% chance for enemies killed by Jacob to drop an additional 1/2 red heart, once per room.

name: Esau Soul On Kill
description: 0.5% chance for enemies killed by Esau to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart, once per room.

name: Brother Hit Negation
description: 5% chance to negate a killing hit if the opposing brother has more than 1 red heart remaining.
When this happens, set the opposing brother's remaining red hearts to 1.

name: Heart Luck
description: +0.04 luck per 1/2 heart of any type with the brother that has the lower remaining hearts.
Bonus is given to both brothers.

name: Birthright
description: 2% chance for Mom to additionally drop Birthright when defeated.
If Mom doesn't drop Birthright, roll for half the chance again when defeating Mom's heart.

name: Jacob Heart On Kill
description: 2% chance for enemies killed by Jacob to drop an additional 1/2 red heart, once per room.

name: Esau Soul On Kill
description: 2% chance for enemies killed by Esau to drop an additional 1/2 soul heart, once per room.

name: Dark Songstress
description: Non-charmed enemies receive 8% less damage.
Using Siren's Song removes this effect and grants +8% damage and speed for the current room.

name: Song of Darkness
description: 2% chance to drop an additional black heart when clearing a room.
[Harmonic] Charmed enemies you kill increase this chance by 0.4%, up to 6%.
[Harmonic] +0.1 damage per 1/2 black heart remaining.
Harmonic modifiers become inactive if you have more than 2 song nodes allocated.

name: Song of Fortune
description: +1 luck
[Harmonic] Using Siren's Song has a 15% chance to grant +0.05 luck.
[Harmonic] When below 4 luck, 50% chance for charmed enemies to grant an additional 0.01 luck on kill.
[Harmonic] When above 4 luck, 25% chance for charmed enemies to grant no luck on kill.
Harmonic modifiers become inactive if you have more than 2 song nodes allocated.

name: Song of Celerity
description: +7% tears
[Harmonic] +7% speed
[Harmonic] +1% tears when hitting a charmed enemy, up to 15%. Effect resets every room.
Harmonic modifiers become inactive if you have more than 2 song nodes allocated.

name: Song of Awe
description: +4% all stats when using Siren's Song, once per room. Effect resets every room.
[Harmonic] Siren's Song additionally slows enemies by 90% for 2 seconds on use.
[Harmonic] Siren's Song gains an additional charge when clearing a room.
Harmonic modifiers become inactive if you have more than 2 song nodes allocated.

name: Luck On Charmed Kill
description: 0.5% chance for charmed enemies to grant an additional 0.01 luck on kill.

name: Might Of Fortune
description: +0.05% all stats except luck for every 1 luck you have.

name: Charmed Retaliation
description: When a charmed enemy hits you, return 0.4 damage.

name: Charmed Hit Negation
description: 1% chance to negate a killing hit from a charmed enemy.
This can only happen once per room.

name: Charm Explosions
description: 0.5% chance for charmed enemies to explode in a cloud of pheromones on death, dealing 4 damage and
charming nearby enemies.

name: Luck On Charmed Kill
description: 2% chance for charmed enemies to grant an additional 0.01 luck on kill.

name: Might Of Fortune
description: +0.2% all stats except luck for every 1 luck you have.

name: Charmed Retaliation
description: When a charmed enemy hits you, return 2 damage.

name: Charmed Hit Negation
description: 4% chance to negate a killing hit from a charmed enemy.
This can only happen once per room.

name: Charm Explosions
description: 2% chance for charmed enemies to explode in a cloud of pheromones on death, dealing 4 damage and
charming nearby enemies.
